author: Zoe Tidman, Zoe Tidman
title: Coronavirus: North Korea 'secretly seeks international help to raise virus testing' despite maintaining claim of no cases
description: Experts warn an outbreak in country could have dire consequences
content:
North Korea has reportedly reached out for international help during the coronavirus pandemic despite publicly claiming the country has zero infections. 
Officials have privately been asking contacts around the world to help boost their capacity for testing,… [+1944 chars]
